Class LoyaltyCard

java.lang.Object
  




public class LoyaltyCard
extends java.lang.Object

A generic loyalty card scheme for a university bookshop with the ability to track points, as well as card owner details.

Version:
(v1.0 11/10/18)
Author:
(Grant Allenby)
